mapper.select: SELECT dt.idn_deadline_type as key, dt.deadline_desc as value FROM tpa_tdeadline_type dt WHERE dt.deadline_type IN ('STANDARD.RECEPTION', 'STANDARD.MANAGEMENT') ORDER BY execution_order
SELECT o.IDN_OPERATION_TERM as key, o.TERM_CODE as value FROM tpa_voperation o WHERE o.CATEGORY_CODE = 'CONTRACT' order by o.IDN_OPERATION_TERM
SELECT o.idn_operation FROM tpa_voperation o WHERE o.category_code = 'CONTRACT' AND o.idn_operation_term = #{idn_operation_term}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tpa_toperation_deadline (idn_operation_deadline, idn_operation,idn_deadline_type, idn_deadline_limit, start_date, hour_limit, day_limit, month_limit, days_before, months_before, years_before, aud_ins_user,aud_last_user) VALUES (tpa_soperation_deadline.nextval, #{idn_operation}, #{idn_deadline_type}, (SELECT idn_deadline_limit FROM tpa_tdeadline_limit WHERE LIMIT_CODE = 'MAX'), #{startDate}, #{shourLimit}, #{dayLimit}, #{monthLimit}, #{daysBefore}, #{monthsBefore}, #{yearsBefore}, #{username}, #{username})
